column1: Weighted MRI size (128, 256, 1) in T2, exhibiting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°56 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image reveals the presence of the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6.5918 mm³.
